resources.string: Vietnamese astrology was created to let you get a hold of your destiny by using specific identification items such as your name, gender, date and time of birth to foresee parts of your future. Want to know more details about your future rather than common horoscope that you can find anywhere? Start reading now to get your prediction!
You must enter your name for the correct prediction.
You must choose your gender for the correct prediction
You must choose your date of birth for the correct prediction
You must choose your time of birth for the correct prediction
You must choose your place of birth for the correct prediction
Enter your correct details so we can predict your future.
Note : If you were born on exactly 19h then you belong to the Dog hour instead of the Chicken.
Your year of birth belongs to

Men born on the year of the horse or the goat with the life fate situated on the Mouse or Buffalo sign \: There are a lot of difficulties in life you must face and there won\'t be much time you will be satisfied by the result. However if you can overcome the hard time then you will succeed.
You are respected and loved by other people.
You will lead a leisure life.
You are ery smart and sharp. You may face lots of difficulties when young.
However there is the star of Thien dia khong on the same spot so you can live a long life.
You will have a standard life style.
You may not have a very good health. Be sure to pay special attention to your lifestyle.
You face lots of difficulties when young like a pure flower getting smashed by the wind.
You Will get rich but you don\'t have a very good health.
You may not be rich but you will live a long life.

Your \"Menh\" has \"Tuan triet\" star on it. It is a bad sign but there are no big star and \"Tuan triet\" is a small star so you won\'t face any problems. You will get what you want and live a long happy life.

Your \"Menh\" sign has \"Dia khong\" star, your \"Than\" sign has \"Dia kiep\" star. This combination shows that you are smart and sharp. However you will experience more sadness than happiness in your life. There may be more failure than success so you have to stay strong and keep things cool to go through it.

Since there is \"Dai hao\" and \"Tieu hao\" stars \(bad stars\) but there are no big star that shines on them you won\'t have bad luck. Even though you may not be very smart and bright at school, you will still have money and become a successful person.
Your \"Menh\" or your \"Than\" sign has \"Thien dong\", \"Thien luong\" or \"Pha quan\" stars shinning on it. Bad combination! Be careful with your health!

Your \"Menh\" sign has \"Dia kiep\" star shinning on it, your \"Than\" sign has \"Dia khong\" star on it. This result shows that you are smart and sharp. However you will experience more sadness than happiness in your life. There may be more failure than success so you have to stay strong and keep things cool to go through it.
Your \"Menh\" sign has no big star shinning on it. In this situation you will have lots of hardship and labor during your youth.

Your \"Than\" sign is situated on \"Thien di\" sign. This combination shows that you will build your career far from home and it will become very successful. You are an active person who loves to travel and to move to new places so you are not very family-oriented. You loves to meet new people and have a huge network connection. Most people in this situation experience life in their youth very early compared to other people around their age. They have more experience and lots of opportunities to work far from home.
Since your \"Thien di\" sign has \"Tuan triet\" star on it, you will not pass away in your hometown.

Your \"Than\" sign is situated in your \"The thiep\"\(husband/wife\) category and there is the star of "Thai am" on it so you will need lots of help from your husband/wife. You may also be someone who are scared of your husband/wife.
Your \"Than\" sign is situated in your \"The thiep\"\(husband/wife\) category and there is the star of "Tuan triet" on it. Be careful! You may face some difficulties with your marital life.

Your \"Than\" sign is situated on the same place as your "Tai Bach" category, this means you are a hardworking person who want to save lots of money. Your number one concern in life will be money, you work hard to earn money to feed yourself. You have fast management skill with money. You make money very fast but career for you is not an important factor as long as you can earn money you will work on whatever field.
You will earn fame before money.
You get rich by making business.
You should try to avoid career in the maritime field as you may have some accidents with working on water.

Your \"Than\" and \"Quan loc\" signs are together, this means you have a clear goal when you are/were studying on what career you are going to choose. You will be faithful to that career until the end.

\"Than\" and \"Phu the\" signs are together so you have some interesting things happening in your love life. You and your love met/will meet under a very special circumstance, you will feel like you have known him/her for long time already, you and your love have a strong bond and mostly it happens that you will work on the same field/area. Also, you may have a left-hand job. At first you may just do it for pure pleasure but in the long run it will become a successful career in your life.

Your \"Than\" and \"Menh\" signs are in the same spot, you believe in destiny and you may easily give up when things get hard. Your life doesn\'t have much things going on. If you are born rich you will stay rich but you are born poor it will be very difficult to become rich.

"Than" and \"Quan loc\" sign Your "Than" and "Quan Loc" signs are together which give a good combination. However you have the star "Tuan triet", "Hoa ky" or "Dia kiep" there also, if you are a man your career success will come slow.

"Than" and \"Quan loc\" signs are together = good result. However you have \"Tuan triet\" and \"Sat tinh\" star on there also. If you are a girl you should protect yourself from being cheated by bad guys.

You have \"Tang mon\" and \"Bach ho\" stars combined together, you may feel lonely, you may be slow on getting married or have troubles with your marital life but don\'t get discouraged so easily. There are other good things in life besides a steady relationship.

Your \"Tha\n" sign is situated on \"Phuc duc\" sign so you have a strong feeling for family and strong sense of belonging to your nation. You like to have a life with a big family and have strong bonds with all your family members close or far. Since you have a strong love for your birth country you will likely live there for the rest of your life.

\"Menh\" sign in astrology represents your thoughts, your direction in life, your character and capability. The "Menh" sign is anything that happens in those areas mentioned above from the moment of your birth til 30 years old.

Your \"Menh\" sign has good stars and is situated in a good place. Hence, if you are a woman, you have a hot and curvy body. If you are a man you are tall. You are smart and you will have lots of good luck. You also live a long life.
Your \"Menh\" sign is situated in a not suitable area. You may not be very smart but you will live a long life with enough money to lead a standard life.
Your character is straigh forward and lenient.
You are someone who dare to do what you say and have lots of ideas and strategies.
Your \"Menh\" sign has lots of good star on it. You will have all\: power, money and health. You will live a full happy life.

Your \"Menh\" sign has \"Tuan triet\" star on it, bad alert! You may have some troubles with your parents or siblings. When you are young you may face lots of difficulties and need to move far from home. You also need to pay special attention to your health since you may fall sick easily.

However, Your \"Menh\" sign has the star \"Dia khong\" and \"Dia kiep\", which are bad stars. Hence you will be struggling with lots of problems with your career and you will always have to think for solutions.

Your \"Menh\" sign is situated in the Cat and the Chicken position, also there is the star of "Tham Lang" next. You tend to look at life with subjective eyes. Sometimes you want to get isolated from the city life to go to a quiet place. Meditation may be a good thing for you.
Your \"Menh\" sign has \"Thien phu\", \"Ta phu\" or \"Huu bat\" stars next to it so you are sure to have a rich life.
Your \"Menh\" sign has the star of \"Kinh duong\" on it, so if you follow commerce careers you will succeed and become rich.

Your \"Menh\" sign is situated on the Snake or Pig position. It has \"That sat\" and \"Dong cung\" star on it and "Tuan triet" star next to it. Hence you may not make lots of money although you may have fame/gain some position with your career field.
Your \"Menh\" sign is in the same spot as \"Ta phu\" and \"Huu bat\" stars so your life will be wealthy and your words will be very powerful.
Your \"Menh\" sign has \"Liem trinh\" star on it so you will have a tall body, heavy bones, dark elbows and strong face features.

Your \"Menh\" sign has the star of \"Liem trinh\" and is situated on a good place. Hence, you are righteous, straightforward, courageous, strict and hot tempered. You will get wealth and live a long life.
Besides, your \"Menh\" sign also has \"Van xuong\" \"Van khuc\" stars on it so you are someone with capability and flexibility.
However, because your \"Menh\" sign also has another bad star like \"Sat tinh\" so you may not get what you want (money or career).

The \"Liem trin\h" star, which is situated in your \"Menh\" sign, is placed at a bad position. Hence you are someone that may be harsh and dangerous sometimes, you have the business mind, very handy, like competition. You will tend to follow a career in the technical, industrial or hand-craft field. You may be a little weak and have some health problems and can face some accidents if not careful enough. You should build a career far from home to have a long life.

However, you are lucky to have \"Hoa ky\" and \"Dong cung\" or \"Menh\" sign situated on the Snake or Pig position. You don\'t need to worry about accidents or health problems and you will lead a good life.
Your \"Menh\" sign has the star of \"Thien dong\". In result you have a curvy but kind of short body with white skin and square face.

Your \"Menh\" sign has the star of \"Thien Dong\" situated on a good place. In result you are smart with a forgiving attitude, gentle, like to care about others but you are not determined and perseverate. You will likely change your career field. However you will be sure to live a long life with wealth.
Besides, since your \"Menh\" sign is in the position of the Snake or the Pig, with the star of \"Thien Dong\", it shows that you are someone who loves adventures and travel.
However, with \"Thien dong\" star on \"Menh\" sign, in the position of the Snake or the Pig for someone born on contradicting year will give a negative result. You may not achieve what you want.

If your \"Menh\" has the star of \"Thien dong\" situated on a good place, but has other bad stars like \"That sat\", \"Thien hinh\" or \"Dong cung\", then you will still have enough money to live a standard life but your health will not be very good. You may be careful as you will likely have health problems related to the eyes or digestive system.

Your \"Menh\" sign has \"Thien di\" star in a bad position. Hence you may not be very smart, you act impulsively. You are gentle but you are someone who gets bored easily. You prefer to play than to work. You will likely live a long life but you will face lots of struggles. You will live a life far from home. Commerce will be a good field for you.
You usually like to exaggerate things, you may not be careful enough with your words so you tend to make other people unhappy.
Your \"Menh\" sign is situated in the Horse position, which is a bad thing for the \"Thien dong\" star but you still have a strong business mind.

Your \"Menh\" is situated in the position of the Horse or Dog. It is not good with the star of \"Thien dong\" but with the year of birth you are born in it is a good result. Hence you will be sure to get wealth.
Your \"Menh\" sign is in the position of the Tiger or the Monkey, with \"Thien luong\" star on it so you will have a bright future with lots of wealth and health.

Your \"Menh\" sign has the \"Thai duong\" and \"Dong cung\" stars, with the combination of "That sat" star so you will be working on the technological field or business selling and trading. It will be very good for you.
Your \"Menh\" sign has the stars of \"Thai am\", \"Thien dong\" and \"Dong cung\" so they will shine very bright. If you are a girl, you will be a very pretty and lovely girl.
However, because your \"Menh\" sign has bad stars on it like "Tang mon" or \"Thien khoc\" \"Thien rieu\" stars so you will drop lots of tears for your loved ones.
Your \"Menh\" sign has the star of \"Vu khuc\" so you have a curvy body with average height. You usually live a life far from your family and have problems with your parents, your wife or your kids.

Your \"Menh\" sign has the star of \"Vu khuc\" in a good position. Hence you are smart, strong-willed, have organization skill, a business mind, determined, straightforward, You will live a long life full of wealth.

Your \"Menh\" sign is situated in the Buffalo or Goat position. Although it is a good place but you will have problems with your career, the income will be irregular. You will only be able to get rich after 30 years old.
Your \"Menh\" sign is situated in the Cat position, good with \"Vu khuc\" star so you will get wealth however you will have health problems related to the head area.

Cung mênh có vị trí Dậu, tốt với sao Vũ Khúc, tuy được hưởng giàu sang nhưng bạn hay mắc bệnh nội thương trong người khó chữa, hay mắc tai nạn xe cộ. Nếu bạn sinh ở hướng tây bắc, thì số mệnh cực kỳ tốt, có uy quyền hiển hách, khuất phục được những côn đồ gian ác, được nhiều người kính trọng.

Cung mệnh có vị trí không tốt với sao Vũ khúc, nên bạn kém thông minh, có tính tham lận và không được lương thiện, suốt đời chẳng mấy khi được xứng ý toại lòng, vì công danh trắc trở, tiền tài khó kiếm, thường hay phải bỏ nhà lập nghiệp ở phương xa, hay đi làm thợ, nếu có của cải của tiền nhân để lại, rồi cũng phá tán hết, và dĩ nhiên không sống thọ.

Cung mệnh có vị trí không tốt với sao Vũ khúc, trong trường hợp này bạn có nhiều sao tốt xung quanh, nên bạn chuyên về thủ công, kỹ thuật hay kinh doanh buôn bán, nhưng khá giả và được hưởng tuổi thọ lâu dài.
Cung mệnh có sao Vũ Khúc đồng cung với sao xấu Phá Quân, nên bạn tất bỏ nhà kiếm ăn phương xa, suốt đời cực khổ vất vả.
Cung mệnh có sao Vũ khúc, sao Phá quân gặp sao Văn Xương, Văn Khúc đồng cung, bạn là người thông minh khéo tay, nên chuyên về kỹ nghệ máy móc.

Cung mệnh bạn có sao Thái Dương, vị trí tốt, nên bạn có thân hình đẫy đà, cao vừa tầm, da hồng hào, mặt vuông vắn đầy đặn, có vẻ uy nghi, mặt sáng, dáng điệu đường hoàng, bệ vệ rất thông minh, tính thẳng thắn, cương nghị, hơi nóng nảy, nhưng nhân hậu từ thiện được hưởng giàu sang và sống lâu.

Tuy nhiên , cung mệnh lại bị sao xấu là tuần triệt án ngữ, giống như 1 tảng đá đè ánh nắng chói chang của mặt trời, thành ra suốt đời không được xứng ý toại lòng, thiếu sức khoẻ, thường có bệnh đau đầu, khí huyết, mắt kém, nếu không xa quê hương lập nghiệp thì khó có thể sống lâu.
Tuy nhiên, cung Mệnh bị sao xấu là tuần triệt án ngữ, tuy mắt kém, thường thiếu sức khoẻ, hay có bệnh đau đầu, nhưng bạn vẫn có tài lộc.

Cung mệnh có vị trí không tốt với sao Thái Dương, nên thân hình bạn nhỏ nhắn, hơi gầy, cao vừa tầm, da xanh xám mặt choắc mắt buồn tẻ, má hóp, mắt lộ, cũng khá thông minh, tính cũng nhân hậu từ thiện nhưng hơi ương bướng, lại không kiên trì, mắt kém, hay có bệnh đau đầu, bệnh thần kinh, khí huyết, nếu không xa quê hương thì tất không sống lâu được. Về già mới được ăn nhàn sung sướng.
Cung mệnh của bạn ở vị trí Tý hay Hợi, nên bạn là người có đức độ, ham chuộng văn chương, triết học đạo lý.
Cung mệnh của bạn ở vị trí Thân hay Tuất hay Tý, nên dù không tốt cho sao Thái Dương, vẫn không đến nỗi xấu xa lắm, bạn vẫn được cơm no áo ấm, chẳng nên lo ngại nhiều về bệnh tật.
Tuy cung mệnh của bạn ở vị trí không tốt vvới sao Thái Dương, nhưng bạn có nhiều sao đẹp bên cạnh, nên bạn tất có công danh, tiền tài và được tăng thêm phúc thọ.

Tuy cung mệnh của bạn ở vị trí không tốt với sao Thái Dương, nhưng bạn có sao Tuần Triệt vốn là sao xấu thì nay làm cung mệnh tốt đẹp, tuy bạn phải xa quê hương, nhưng được hưởng giàu sang khoẻ mạnh và sống lâu.

Cung mệnh có vị trí không tốt với sao Thái Dương, lại thêm các ngôi sao không tốt như sao Kình Dương, sao Đà la nên bạn rất cô đơn, phải lang thang phiêu bạt, thiếu sức khoẻ, hay có bệnh đau đầu, bệnh thần kinh khí huyết, mắt kém.

Cung mệnh của bạn có cả sao Thái âm, mặt trăng mặt trời cùng đồng vị trí nên kém tốt đẹp hơn trường hợp đứng riêng rẻ, do 2 sao đã làm giảm ánh sáng của nhau. Tuy nhiên vẫn là 1 cung mệnh tốt về sự nghiệp, tiền bạc và sức khoẻ.

Cung mệnh của bạn có cả sao Thái âm,gặp sao Văn Xương hay Văn Khúc hội hợp với các sao Thiên Quí, hay Quốc ấn nên bạn là người có văn tài lỗi lạc, hay nguỵ biện, biết trì thủ, biết ứng xử đúng lúc và chắc chắn là được hưởng giàu sang.

Cung mệnh của bạn có cả sao Thái Âm, nhưng do gặp sao Tuần Triệt án ngữ, bình thường tuy không tốt nhưng với trường hợp của bạn, lại cực tốt. Bạn là người có sự nghiệp học hành rất cao, có quyền cao chức trọng.
Cung mệnh của bạn có sao Thái Âm, tuy không tốt bạn có cả sao Hoá khoa hoá lộc là những sao tốt, nên chắc chắn bạn là người giữ chức lớn trong chính quyền.

Cung mệnh của bạn có sao Thái Âm ở cung hội chiếu, giống như cuộc đời có cả mặt trăng mặt trời thay nhau chiếu sáng, suốt đời chắc chắn bạn được hưởng giàu sang, lại gìn giữ được quyền thế và tài lộc bền vững.
Cung mệnh của bạn có sao Cự môn ở vị trí hội chiếu, nên chắc chắn suốt đời được hưởng lộc dồi dào và công danh bền vững.
